idea:
Our aim and objective to provide a low cost and experienced solutions under one roof with geographically spread to the Organisations, want to outsource their Back office, Finance, banking, tax and compliance activities.

We, after a long career in the Industries, have started the  Practice on Shared CFO Services includes :-

Back office support functions , streamlining accounting processes, managing internal controls, enabling data analysis, timely and accurate financial reporting, dashboards that bring KPIs, budgeting, forecasting and planning, establish road map for business, arrangement of Funds,  banking, managing legal, compliance and people management.

Our offices are  in Mumbai, Ahmadabad, Vadodara, Indore and Bhubaneshwar with  complete Infrastructure and experienced Partners from the corporate sectors.

We commit  to deliver the services to the clients with full dedication and expertise with confidentiality and low cost. We aimed for long term relationship.
name: SUBRAT NAYAK &ASSOCIATES

idea:
Our Business Services provide simple, ready to use/ customised affordable business management solutions to propel start-ups and SMEs in the desired direction by co-creating value for them.


We help our clients formulate business strategies, hire talent, design new process and streamline their existing business activities to help them start, run and grow their business.


We provide,


Recruitment Services

Management Services

IT Services


For Cloud Counselage it all started with a noble cause of helping the youth of India to make their careers, in fact their lives in the process. We at Cloud Counselage believe in working ground-up to train and groom the youth of 'New India' into IT & Management, to build capacities in terms of an online coordinated workforce PAN India.
name: CLOUD COUNSELAGE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Chirag Aggarwal & Anuja Jadhav, co-founders of Kokos Natural, quit our respective corporate jobs back in 2016, to pursue

our passion. We share a unified vision to educate and spread awareness about a healthy

lifestyle- and eating right is a major part of achieving the same.

The process of making organic and natural coconut sugar is a lengthy, tiring and

labour-intensive job. We noticed that these farmers put their heart and soul in making this

beautiful sugar, but their network is very very limited. Our endeavour, as a team, is to help them

widen their reach through the country, because they deserve to make their produce a part of

every kitchen in India.

When we visited Tamil Nadu in search of Raw Banana Flour, we came across a farm owned by

a farmer family of 12 members. We saw their process and realised that these people worked

round the clock to produce excellent quality of banana flour and at the same time, they ensured

that the quality was kept consistent throughout. Having looked at this passion and dedication,

we decided to join hands with them and work together and Kokos Natural was born.

We’re into retailing and wholesaling 100% organic products such as Himalayan Pink Salt, Raw

banana flour, Organic Coconut Sugar, Cassava Flour, Beetroot Powder & Supergreen Powder. These are carefully

chosen products which cater to our niche audience (which is growing rapidly).

We sell online on several ecommerce marketplaces including key players like Amazon & Big

Basket. Our offline presence is spread across retail outlets and supermarkets in metro cities.


We would want to increase our global reach going forward since we really wish to expand our

products to the consumers outside India. The farmers of India are the most hard working and

underappreciated and it only seems fair for their produce to reach as many people out there as

possible.

On the other hand, the awareness about healthier and pure substitutes of everyday food

ingredients needs to spread wider. We intend on doing that too, taking our products to places

one can only imagine. A lot of active consumers of some of our products are probably still

buying the expensive global alternatives and we would like to change that going forward.


We’re a self funded startup and within a year of opening business we had broken even and

making a growth of 100% month on month. We were recognised by several newspapers,

magazines, blogs and celebrities.

We’ve been part of several food exhibitions, covered by popular food influencers like Pooja

Dhingra and have been the Top Seller on Amazon in for the longest of time.

We’ve started selling our products in the global markets through Amazon Global in parts of

Europe and United States as well.


We have been awarded the 'Best Startup of the Year in the Organic Sector' in 2018 by ASSOCHAM.

Our Co-founder Anuja Jadhav has been awarded 'Emerging Woman Entrepreneur of the Year in Organic Sector' in 2019 by ASSOCHAM.
name: KOKOS NATURAL

idea: Radee Health Ventures is a Private Label Distributor of OTC Products online/offline on Marketplaces in the US, India and around the world. Products are sold under the brand LILAS.

idea:
To carry on the business of providing life care and support services to the elderly people of  the society. To provide advisory and consulting services on all matters and problems 

related to their life and lifestyle, providing day to day home management services,  arranging events, providing support to perform outdoor and or indoor household work. To provide medical, safety & security services. To arrange for workshops and tours, sponsorship for elderly people. To establish and maintain assisted affordable living facilities/ clinics/hospitals and other services for the well-being of the elderly people.
name: ELDERS LIFECARE SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Brief Profile:

We at, NANO SERENDIPITY CONSORTIUM PVT. LTD. are dynamic innovative “Global technology organization” into “Nanotechnology education & technology transfer”, focusing on “Employ ability skills, applications & sustainable development”.

We are passionate and committed to help industries overcome their business challenges and we have great potential to become pioneers, as there is a huge market potential globally. We look forward to associate on mutual consensus with a win-a-win opportunity, in the interest of the economic & technology progress of the world.

VISION:

· Innovative Technology Transfer with Nanotechnology applications in various industries by solving issues in their areas of operations, making it cost effective energy efficient and eco-friendly. Ex: Hotels, Real Estate, Automobiles, Cosmetics, Food, Jewellery, Carbon black Nano-diamonds, Fabrics, Agriculture, Solar Energy, Healthcare, Cancer, Diabetes, Defense, Aviation, Solar energy , Electronics, Oil & Gas etc. Nanomaterials is 340 billion$ market globally, Energy sustainability 100 billion $, Electronics 300 billion $ etc.

  · Achievements: We have highly accomplished award - winning scientists on academic advisory board and entrepreneurs on corporate advisory board. We have esteemed clients & made successful Nanotechnology transfer in 5-star Hotels and luxurious Real Estate industries / Infrastructure who have procured Nanotechnology through our initiative and benefitted from our solutions like Taj Group, Oberoi, Sheraton, Aditya Birla, GMR Airport, Fern, Bank of America BKC, Radisson etc

We are into consumer & enterprise technology, Nano coating products and services eco friendly for surface treatment of infrastructure applications and niche nanotechnology with proven track record of esteemed clients on board saving energy and reducing carbon footprint. We also have independent individual clients who have procured our innovative solutions on multiple surfaces like personal homes, hi end cars, mobiles, fabric, electronics, gadgets etc. We are utilizing the Energy savings proof from “America Energy Savings calculator” that is helping our clients save energy / electricity in millions. We are also into eco-consultation pertaining eco-friendly Nanotechnology solutions to support the goal of becoming a sustainable green building to address current challenges.
name: NANO SERENDIPITY CONSORTIUM PRIVATE LIMITED
